definition: people of the Dong ethnic minority

sentences.english: People of the Dong ethnic group in Hunan province have the custom of making kippers during Cold Dew.
sentences.chinese: 在寒露時節制醃魚是湖南侗家人的習俗。

sentences.english: The captain of the boat cast off the line and we were soon out in open water.
sentences.chinese: 船長解開繩纜，我侗很快就航行在開闊的水面上。

sentences.english: The festival was held by the Dong people to celebrate the harvest, according to the local media.
sentences.chinese: 當地媒體報導，侗年節是爲了慶祝豐收。

sentences.english: General Yang Zhicheng was born in Sansui county, Guizhou province.
sentences.chinese: 楊至成將軍是貴州省三穗縣八弓鎮木界村侗家人。

sentences.english: At different time , we may meet different people .
sentences.chinese: 在吥侗徳時間，會遇上不同徳秂。

definition: ancient wine vessel/ancient sacrificial vessel/Yi ethnic group/normal nature of man/laws and rules
see 仡佬族[Ge1 lao3 zu2], Gelao or Klau ethnic group of Guizhou/Taiwan pr. [Qi4]
Wa, Kawa or Va ethnic group of Myanmar, south China and southeast Asia
Jingpo ethnic group of Tibet and Yunnan
Qiang ethnic group, nowadays esp. in north Sichuan
Tu or White Mongol ethnic group of Qinghai
